rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {2982, 2984, 2985, 2986, 3462}

description: This unit discusses the more common causes of cutaneous ulceration other than venous insufficiency i.e. skin cancer.  The three main types of skin cancer are described, as are the principles of treatment and prognosis Other topics covered include clinical features and treatment of Eczema, Vasculitis, Necrobiosis lipoidica, Pyoderma gangrenosum,  Mycobacterium Ulcerans and Chromoblastomyosis.
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
